name: Orbit
storyline:
The singularity is set all over the globe. The current planet is effectively dominated by artificial intelligence (AI), and humans are not allowed to do any of the activities to build knowledge except for the permitted activities (playing, eating, etc.). Humans who are awake with knowledge are considered enemies of AI.
There are several zones in the game, and arete, the driving force that allows AI to move in each zone, exists. In the play, the main character is responsible for preventing AI by destroying the arete. The main character plays the role of an action worker in Iris, a group of people who advocate woke intellectuals, and the group's assistant gives the main character the skills to help at every cool time.
summary: Save a world powerless from AI
